long_description: Super Valve Best of the Best 3 Pack New for 2011 & AVAILABLE NOW.These three Panther Martins Classic spinners are proven to catch trout,bass,pike,crappie,and many other spieces.Kit contains 1 each 4 PMR G 1/8 oz 4 PMR S 1/8 oz AND 4 PMH TGR 1/8 oz.
